content: HLC-FPH Sleeve anchor Economical sleeve anchor (Phillips flat head) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Stud type anchor design allows easy through-type fastenings and can be set in bottomless hole Countersunk flat Phillips head for special applications Pre-assembled anchor for easy and fast installation Anchor size is same as drill bit size for easy installation Comprehensive testing in block, masonry and concrete base materials Applications Fastening in solid concrete and masonry base materials ### TECHNICAL DATA: Head configuration: Countersunk Phillips Environmental conditions: Indoor, dry conditions Approvals / Test reports: N/A Technical Data | Head configuration | Countersunk Phillips | Environmental conditions | Indoor, dry conditions | Approvals / Test reports | N/A | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Type of fixing | Through-fastening ### ITEMS- 336234 -
